attributes.action: Reinstate Boris Johnson as Leader of the Conservative Party & the PEOPLE’S PM
attributes.additional_details: We need Boris. We cannot afford to lose him. He is best Leader for our country at this present time.
attributes.background: After the travesty of our democratically elected Prime Minister being pushed out of office, we, his loyal supporters, party members and voters, demand that he is immediately reinstated as Leader of the Conservative Party.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. This includes calling for a specific Minister to be given a, or removed from their, job.

In any case, any decision to seek to rescind his resignation would be a personal matter between Boris Johnson and the Conservative Party, not the UK Government or House of Commons as a whole.
